Package org.maxicp.state.datastructures

Class StateSparseBitSet.SupportBitSet

java.lang.Object
org.maxicp.state.datastructures.BitSet
org.maxicp.state.datastructures.StateSparseBitSet.SupportBitSet
Enclosing class:
StateSparseBitSet
public class StateSparseBitSet.SupportBitSet extends BitSet
Bitset of the same capacity as the outer StateSparseBitSet. It is not synchronized with StateManager. It is rather intended to be used as parameter to the intersect(BitSet) method to modify the outer StateSparseBitSet.
